1646400.name: Genry's parables: Scientist Story
1646400.description:
Genry's parables: Scientist Story is a Half-Life 2 mod that tells the incredible story of Genry Freedom.

Mod features:

- average duration - 1.5 hour playing time
- there are 4 endings (1 - secret)
- you can kill the headcrab with a mandarin duck
- prequel to Half-Life 2: Genry's Great Escape From City 13 (don't play the sequel, I beg you)
- Genry Freedom
- 6 completely different locations
1646400.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 丹麦语, 繁体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 俄语, 泰语, 芬兰语, 瑞典语, 日语
